title: Best of the Program | Guest: Sara Gonzales | 2/1/22
description:
Glenn ponders whether we’re in a parallel universe as the political divide continues to get bigger across the country. The Left’s beliefs are their religion and the government their god. Glenn reads a New York Times article by David Brooks and explains why the world is going mad. Blaze TV Host Sara Gonzales joins Glenn to discuss her comedy video parodying Nancy Pelosi, Joe Rogan, and the Freedom Convoy of truckers in Canada.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
